location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 34: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Residents at Bussora [Basra] to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Residents at Bussora [Basra], discuss the delivery of a packet for the President and Council of Bombay, on a Carrack [Bandar-e ChƒÅrak] boat, Jumma Noquedah,to be forwarded via the Broker at Muscat.
